query:
SELECT 
  po.id as orderId,
  po.orderNumber,
  po.status as orderStatus,
  poi.productId,
  poi.quantity as orderedQty,
  poi.separatedQuantity,
  p.sku,
  p.description,
  t.name as clientName
FROM pickingOrders po
INNER JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
INNER JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
INNER JOIN tenants t ON po.tenantId = t.id
WHERE p.sku = '443060' 
  AND po.status IN ('pending', 'in_progress', 'separated')
ORDER BY po.createdAt DESC;
